item.title: 30 Days of AI in Testing Challenge: Day 3: List ways in which AI is used in testing
item.description: This blog post is the third day of the 30-Day AI Testing Challenge and focuses on the many ways AI can be used in testing. The post may include an introduction to the various uses of AI in testing, such as automated testing, defect analysis, performance test optimization, and more. Readers will learn how AI can improve the testing process and increase testing efficiency, as well as the potential benefits of applying AI in testing. This series promises to provide a platform for testing professionals to comprehensively understand and discuss the use of AI in testing.
